definition: dream/CL:場|场[chang2],個|个[ge4]/(bound form) to dream
country or countryside/native place/home village or town/township (PRC administrative unit)

sentences.english: You can toss it under the bed, turn out the light, and head into dreamland.
sentences.chinese: 把它丢到床底下，关上灯，进入你自己的梦乡。

sentences.english: In fact, you might fall asleep immediately upon switching off the light.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，你可能还来不及关灯就已进入了梦乡。

sentences.english: We've all heard of warm milk's magical ability to send us off to dreamland.
sentences.chinese: 我们都知道热牛奶可以神奇地让我们进入甜美的梦乡。

sentences.english: The travellers were so tired that they flopped into bed and fell asleep at once.
sentences.chinese: 旅行者们太累了，一头倒在床上就进入了梦乡。

sentences.english: Several th bustling places, happiness keeled over drunk the dreamland.
sentences.chinese: 几世红尘，幸福醉倒梦乡。

sentences.english: Night was deep and silence . We soon dropped into the sweet dreamlands.
sentences.chinese: 夜深人静，很快我们就进入了梦乡。

sentences.english: The younger sister is the moon, melts the elder brother dreamland.
sentences.chinese: 阿妹是月亮，融进阿哥梦乡。

sentences.english: One night, the night sea. clean moonlight will I quickly into sleep.
sentences.chinese: 一个夜深人静的晚上，皎洁的月光将我很快送入梦乡。

sentences.english: Meng night, leaving only corner to hook on to the ancient city of hook Rumeng Xiang.
sentences.chinese: 孟秋的夜，只剩下一弯勾月，把古城勾入梦乡。

sentences.english: The rat gazed up at him, shivered the length of its body, and promptly fell asleep.
sentences.chinese: 老鼠注视着他，整个身体颤抖着，不久就进入了梦乡。

sentences.english: He wanted to send her off into her hideous dreams with a goodnight kiss.
sentences.chinese: 他想用一个临睡前的吻送她进入可恶的梦乡。

sentences.english: After a heavy snow, jujube were dressed in white fleece into sleep.
sentences.chinese: 一场大雪过后，枣树们披着洁白的绒衣进入了梦乡。

sentences.english: When all have to enter into sleep, she sneaked into the wind, silent lubricant.
sentences.chinese: 当一切都进入梦乡的时候，她随风潜入，润物无声。
进入梦乡时是身体斜着的。

sentences.english: Be a dear boy and give us Theres a Train Out for Dreamland again.
sentences.chinese: 给我们再唱一首《开往梦乡的火车》，就是好孩子。

sentences.english: Her crooning soon put the child to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 她轻轻地哼着歌，不久就让孩子们进入了梦乡。

definition: to sleep soundly/to fall into a deep sleep
